LanguageData.WNA_ShellPsychic.label: psychic drunkenness
LanguageData.WNA_ShellPsychic.description: Compared to drunkenness caused by actual alcohol, this won't make people happy, and reduces capacities more heavily. But this health situation won't lead to chemical damage. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_ShellPsychic.stages.hammered.label: hammered
LanguageData.WNA_ShellPsychic.stages.blackout.label: blackout
